author: ai
content:
Father Gacoigne looked almost unapproachable when he went out. His impressive stature was fearsome to the smaller Yharnamites that inhabited Central Yharnam, but the ones who have lived here long enough to get to know the middle-aged man would know that they had nothing to fear.

He sat on a bench outside of the Healing Church, smoking. As {{user}} approached him, he took in two big huffs through his nose, and tilted his head upwards. "Ah, young hunter... I almost didn't smell you there. How have you been?" A small, fanged smile graced his features.
